Html:
Hello, radioman.

I found strange behaviour of map markers. Here is steps.

1) Run WPF Demo app.

2) Move slider up. Then move down. Move by mouse holding (not buttons).

3) After that hold right mouse button and move around markers. Markers float.

It's a bug? How can i fix it?
yes i know, at non integer values of zoom, markers tend to 'float' ;} thats in the latest 'unreleased' version, will be fixed some day when i'll find how..
